events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, but my package still hasn’t arrived. The tracking information hasn’t updated in several days.
The customer's complaint about their order not arriving on time has been categorized as a Delivery Delay issue.
The case has been assigned to a support agent specializing in shipping and delivery concerns.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear your package hasn’t arrived yet. I’ll do my best to help you track it down.
Could you please provide your order number and the shipping address so I can check the current status for you?
Sure, my order number is 123456789, and it was shipped to 45 Elm Street, Springfield.
Thank you! I’ve contacted the shipping carrier and it seems your package was delayed due to weather conditions. It should arrive within the next 3 days.
Thanks for the update. I’m a bit disappointed about the delay but appreciate you looking into it.
We’ve updated your case to reflect the expected delivery time. Please let us know if your package does not arrive within the next few days.
Just checking in to confirm your order arrived safely and everything is in order. Please reach out if you need any further help.
Since there have been no further issues reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
